str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.
From the base of peran; properly, through, i.e. Around; figuratively with respect to; used in various applications, of place, cause or time.
Spiritual. From pneuma; non-carnal, i.e. ethereal, or a spirit, or supernatural, regenerate, religious.
A brother, member of the same religious community, especially a fellow-Christian. A brother near or remote.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: To will, wish, desire, be willing, intend, design.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
To do not know, be ignorant of, sometimes with the idea of willful ignorance.
